meanings.definition: Luvvies: Affectionate term for actors or performers.
meanings.sent1: The luvvies rehearsed their lines together.
meanings.sent2: The luvvies received a standing ovation for their performance.
meanings.sent3: The luvvies shared a warm hug after the successful show.
meanings.sent4: In the world of theater, luvvies are the stars that shine the brightest.
meanings.sent5: The luvvies' love for the stage was evident in every scene they played.

meanings.definition: Luvvies: People who are involved in the entertainment industry, especially theater.
meanings.sent1: Many luvvies gathered backstage before the show.
meanings.sent2: The luvvies' dedication to their craft was truly inspiring.
meanings.sent3: The luvvies celebrated the successful opening night with a party.
meanings.sent4: In the bustling world of entertainment, luvvies are the heartbeat of the stage.
meanings.sent5: The luvvies' passion for theater was contagious among the cast and crew.

meanings.definition: Luvvies: Those who are passionate about the arts and performing.
meanings.sent1: The luvvies spent hours perfecting their performances.
meanings.sent2: Audiences always appreciate the energy luvvies bring to the stage.
meanings.sent3: The luvvies' enthusiasm for acting was truly infectious.
meanings.sent4: Among the crowd of artists, luvvies stood out like shining stars.
meanings.sent5: The luvvies' love for the arts was evident in every role they took on.
